posts.content:
Selling on behalf of a customer, a 1967 Type 2 Panel Van in OE paint, velvet green.

It has only covered 56000 km's which is 37,000 miles!

Imported from Finland in 2002 with only 21327 Km's - 13251 miles on the clock it was owned by the same family from new for almost 30 years and dry stored with limited use. It has had some patches on the inner cills but is solid throughout. Cab floors are perfect.

It still has its original owners handbook and service record card. The original cab divider is available plus MOT certificates from 2002.

The engine crankcase was replaced several years ago and the stock1500 single port rebuilt.

Lowered one spline at the rear and fitted with an adjustable beam up front. Bug pack shocks all round.
Empi Hurst shifter fitted but original gear stick available. Hand brake lever extender fitted whih is a funky little trick.

Home made interior features double bulk head seat with storage, full width R&R bed with more storage. The interior panels sound deadened and insulated.

Wheels are Empi 5 spokes but 15" crows feet wheels are available with innertubes as well.
Taxed until October 2010 & MOT until 4th June 2011









They don't come up like this very often.

Looking for £16,500 ono.
Located in Bracknel, Berks.
Call me on 07970 540757
Simply beautiful, my budget is a little too shy of the asking price but what an absolutely stunning van. I'll be following this thread, please keep us updated on whether this panel sells please.

I have just got back from a week away so nothing has been done yet.

I am open to offers, but it will go on Ebay next week.

Now on Ebay £15,995

http://cgi.ebay.co.uk/ws/eBayISAPI.dll? ... 0532773458
